CutSceneText.Text: As you know, this passage was created by the Balaur.
It connects to a small abyss known as an Abyssal Splinter.
Rumor says there are undiscovered artifacts
at the end of this Abyssal Splinter.
And the remaining Balaur forces are after those artifacts.
No matter what, someone must defeat the Protector
and claim any artifacts before the Balaur!
And I want YOU to handle this!
